original_title: SriLankan Airlines welcomes another aircraft to its fleet
original_body_lines: SriLankan Airlines recently welcomed the arrival of a wide-bodied Airbus A330-200 aircraft wet-leased from Air Belgium, giving a further boost to its fleet. The aircraft has 22 Business Class and 240 Economy Class seats and is scheduled to operate on the Frankfurt, Dhaka and Dubai routes with effect from 29 December 2023. A second aircraft from Air Belgium is due to join the SriLankan fleet in mid-January 2024.
